creditline: Given in memory of Thomas L. Daniels by his famliy and friends
description: elongated oval body with beaded edge and small pierced gallery; handles extensions of body; pierced with rosettes; monogram JC in center (later addition)
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

hallmarks only on underside; underside engraved [T. Daniell No. 20 Foster Lane London Market]
markings:
Marks; Inscriptions

Makers mark of John Hutson (worn) underneath handle.  Sovereign\'s head, leopards head crowned, lion passant, date letter under base.
title: Tray
